mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ProductsCarousels WHERE id = #{id} AND isDeleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ProductsCarousels (products, createTime, updateTime, isDeleted) VALUES (#{products, typeHandler=com.cows.handler.IntArrayTypeHandler}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE ProductsCarousels SET isDeleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
